LanguageData.MousekinRace_Beehive_HoneyPausedNotEnoug: Paused: Not enough flowers in range ({0} of {1} required).
LanguageData.MousekinRace_Beehive_Instructions: To produce honey and beeswax, the Mousekin beehive must be at a temperature range of {0} ~ {1} and within range of at least {2} cells containing any of the following flowers:\n
LanguageData.MousekinRace_FermentingBarrel_StartInser: Bring mead must or lager wort to the barrel to start fermentation process
LanguageData.MousekinRace_FermentingBarrel_CancelBrin: Cancel bringing mead must or lager wort to the barrel.
